name: EGYLINK GF2100
description: EGYLINK GF2100 is a fast curing silane crosslinkable polyethylene compound curable by moisture and possessing excellent extrusion properties at high output rates, the graft compound GF 2100 is mixed with a crosslinking Catalyst Masterbatch CT0461 generally in the ratio 95:5, the combination have excellent thermo-oxidative stability and can cured in ambient conditions. GF0461 has been specially developed for insulation of low voltage power cables with small diameter.
